name: Just a Typical RPG
description:
This game was made for part of Individual Game Jam CSUI 2021 from University of Indonesia.

Just a Typical RPG is simple, barebone RPG made in less than a week  in which player simply battle an enemy. While the player can simply attack the enemy until they won, they have to use other abilities in order to turn the battle in their favor, as the enemy is stronger than the player.

Diversifier :
La victoir est á moi! -> A taunt system which will reduce enemy accuracy greatly but increases enemy damage and critical chance

La signora ptsd -> Player can inflict bleed to enemy, which does damage every turn until the bleed stops

The hit rate lie -> Player and enemy abilities can miss due to rng

Credits :
